projects.title: Typescript Boilerplate
projects.bodyText:
- Server-side boilerplate using Typescript, MongoDB, Redis, & more...
 -  Fully customizable and dynamic, easily change data structure.

projects.title: Javascript Boilerplate
projects.bodyText:
- Server-side boilerplate using Javascript, Express, MongoDB, Redis, & more...
 -  Fully customizable and dynamic, easily change data structure.

projects.title: Gach Package
projects.bodyText:
- A package to colorize your terminal text messages
- Pre-defined system font & background colors (red, green, ...).
- Set font color using 'rgb' and 'hex'.
- Nested functions for chaining styles.
- Custom styles can be applied using an object for more flexibility.
